subject: RE: [junit] use of setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: ... Yup, this would be a great improvement.  And while we re at it, have JUnit not run any test in this class and subclasses when this happens. We re getting
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of J. B. Rainsberger

> I get the feeling that we only need to add one feature to
> JUnit to have it match TestNG in this regard: labeling tests
> as "SetUp failed" when
> setUp() throws an exception. Right now, they are usually
> reported as errors, and so are lumped in with other
> unexpected exceptions.

Yup, this would be a great improvement. And while we're at it, have JUnit
not run any test in this class and subclasses when this happens.

We're getting there!

--
CÃ©dric
http://beust.com/testng
